messages.subject: Funshop help
messages.msgSnippet: Unfortunately, we have lost quite a few of our unschooling families because they dared to MOVE AWAY or the just DON T COME anymore (you know who you are!
messages.messageBody:
"Unfortunately, we have lost quite a few of our unschooling families
because they dared to MOVE AWAY or the just DON'T COME anymore (you
know who you are! LOL!) "

Hehe....I remember ducking and running when the whole "funschool"
thing came up because I KNEW the families joining it just didn't get
my views at ALL!! (with the exception of a few of course:)
I figured if the unschoolers wanted to get together for sharing an
interest, that could happen without the whole organization thing.

SO.....with that off my chest, have you checked the Live and Learn
website? Full of really cool stuff! Liveandlearnconference.org is the
place to go.
Also, check out the ReThinking Education website for more fun and
awesome ideas, and the HSC (in California) site:

http://www.hsc.org/events/conference2006/

http://www.rethinkingeducation.com/

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
